titleStmt.title: Memoirs of the court of Spain in two parts / written by an ingenious French lady ; done into English by T. Brown.
Mémoires de la cour d'Espagne. English
titleStmt.author: Aulnoy, Madame d' (Marie-Catherine), 1650 or 51-1705.
Brown, Thomas, 1663-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for T. Horn ... F. Saunders ... and T. Bennet ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Mémoires de la cour d'Espagne.
Attributed to La Mothe, Marie Catherine, comtesse d' Aulnoy. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
